title: Mount Fuji
description: Mount Fuji is the tallest mountain in Japan, standing at 3,776 meters (12,389 feet). It is an active stratovolcano that last erupted in 1707.

title: Mount Fuji 2
description: Mount Fuji 2 is the second tallest mountain in Japan, standing at 3,775 meters (12,388 feet). It is an active stratovolcano that last erupted in 1708.
